Just loved this place. Excellent ambiance. Great coffee, excellent music, and very friendly service. Recommended for a place to meet a friend or work !

I, too, found Deux to have deluxe food and delightful staff of two.

Eggplant, meatballs, and hummus came right on through.

We had double pastas of macaroni and lasagna, too.

Soon, I'll be back to try the second half of the menu.

After all the dishes the beautiful waitress suggested dessert.

I was stuffed, but hearing her descriptions, another wouldn't hurt.

The ice cream was rich and creamy, not to mention quite icy.

I wanted to stay, but the bill finally came and was it pricey?

Don't know, my boss paid, but doesn't matter, we'll be back again.
Je voulais juste un café, mais c'est chill pareil. Pour la bouffe, c'est le genre que je me paye pas tous les jours parce que j'ai rien dans les poches. Je suis clairement pas leur clientele cible.

Great little resto in old St Therese. Mixed crowd of young and older. We were three on a Saturday night   We made reservations but the place had room that evening. The decor is a mix and match of old sculptures and modern. We ordered drinks. The lemonade pleased my guest. They have a few imported beers on tap. They have an interesting choice of entrées (apetissers for you out of towners). Fried olives (interesting) grilled octopus ans chorizo (my fave) and creamy cheese plate (nice) with a focaccia. All excellent which encouraged us for the mains. Moussaka and the pork chops were our choices. The moussaka was devine, better than the pork. The sides were just as exciting. Broccoli was excellent, mac n cheese sinful, quinoa salad was refreshing. We were stuffed but still pushed on for desert. Please leave room for the caramel !!!!!

Alerte! ceci n'est basé que sur le coup de foudre rencontré au premier coup d'oeil...je devrai expérimenter un peu plus une fois la passion tamisée.

Ouf, quand je suis entrée chez Deux, je me suis sentie dans un petit bistro chic mais sans prétention, comme on les retrouve dans Outremont.

Une atmosphère cozy, jazzy, sexy...où le menu vous mettra l'eau à la bouche.

Je n'ai que pris qu'un café et dessert... mais ouf! Ce moment m'a fait voyager ans un univers où les papilles n'en avaient jamais assez.

Je dois retourner pour un repas complet! Une variété de plats sont au menu, dont plusieurs choix santé et même vegan! Et leur selection de vin bio, collections privées...puis-je réserver nez rouge d"avance?

Alert! This is based n love at first sight...I will need to come back once the passion will be slightly tamed.

Ouf, when I first entered Deux, I felt like in one of those Outremont chic little Bistro, without any pretension. 

A cozy, jazzy, sexy atmosphere...where the menu will make your mouth water.

I only took a coffee and dessert...but ouf! This moment made me travel to a place where my buds only wanted more!

I have to go back for a full course! A variety of dishes are listed on the menu, among which many healthy ones and even vegan ones! And their selection of a private collection of organic wines...can I reserve Nez-rouge in advance?

Un, DEUX, trois let's drink some coffee! This place is absolute stunning! If you're looking for a cute little place to catch up with someone, then I will definitely recommend you to come here to have a little latte or perhaps their speciality the "nutellatte". From great drinks to great food! And they give such a great service, kudos to their awesome staff! 
I rate this place, DEUX on DEUX!
The food is fantastic - very happy with the polenta, moussaka, mac & cheese (unexpected!), hummus, chocolate cake, caramel... Enfin, lovely cafe with good ambiance and great chefs.

Amateurs de lattés, c'est l'endroit par excellence à fréquenter!!!

Amateurs de cuisine raffinée et savoureuse, c'est l'endroit par excellence à fréquenter!!!

Le personnel est attentionné et très sympathique!!!!
